description:
Ed Sheeran Heardle is a fun wordle-style guessing game based on Ed Sheeran's discography. If you love Ed Sheeran's music and word puzzle games, Ed Sheeran Heardle is a great mashup of the two.

How to Play Ed Sheeran Heardle: A Step-by-Step Guide

1) Go to edsheeranheardle.com. The site will greet you and inform you that you have 6 chances to guess the Ed Sheeran song played in the clip.

2) Click on "Play" to listen to the intro of an Ed Sheeran song. The clip loops and gets slightly longer with each failed attempt.

3) Type in your guess of the song's title in the input box. The closer letters will turn green, while the wrong ones will remain gray.

4) Click "Submit" and the site will either tell you "You got it!" if you guessed correctly or give you another chance and play a slightly longer clip for your next attempt.

5) The game ends either when you correctly guess the song title or exhaust all 6 attempts. You are then shown the song's name and can click "Play Song" to listen to it on YouTube.

6) A new song and challenge begin the next time you visit the site or click "Play Again."
name: ed sheeran heardle
